name: Vertigo Void
description: Vertigo Void is a challenging 3D puzzle-platformer which demands a keen eye and sharp memory. As a lone astronaut, walk up walls, jump across the void of space (or fall in) and teleport your way to safety or else face the Sun's wrath.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Clever little puzzler, with some unique mechanics I haven't really seen in any other game. Relies on your memory and spatial reasoning to make sense of each level Good stuff.
Not bad, not good either. Kinda a neat idea, but super easy levels to begin with bored me out way to quickly.
